snippet.title: Worlds Adrift on Twitch - Island Creator New Features
snippet.description:
Download Worlds Adrift Island Creator for free on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/271920/

On our Twitch Channel (http://www.twitch.tv/bossastudios), we have regular broadcasts where we bring the viewer some new and exciting Worlds Adrift gameplay.

This week, Luke joined Colm to show off some of Bossa's favourite Island Creator submissions, as well as show off some new features of the Island Creator. - Originally aired May 26th on Twitch

The Worlds Adrift Island Creator is a free and powerful tool that lets you design, play and share your own floating islands in the sky. Amongst Worlds Adrift’s universe of thousands of procedurally generated islands, we want to involve you, the community, with the chance to submit your own island creations to be featured in the final game for everyone to discover. 

Build your island using a range of geometric shapes and customise its appearance with textures and objects from the game world. Once you’re happy with your design, switch across to play mode and explore your island from a player’s perspective, all within the tool. Browse Steam Workshop to discover islands that have already been submitted by the community, ready for you to test and rate. You can even collaborate with others to build the perfect island together - the only limit is your imagination. 

Submit your islands and help shape the universe of Worlds Adrift!

Make sure to tune into our Twitch channel every Thursday at 17.00 BST to never miss an episode, or subscribe to the Worlds Adrift YouTube channel and catch the archived version, the following day!

Want to know more? Sign up for exclusive access to Worlds Adrift, to reserve your game name and to talk to the community on the forums at http://www.worldsadrift.com/register

Or head to our official subreddit at https://www.reddit.com/r/worldsadrift

http://www.worldsadrift.com/
